Translations.Text: hijeuleu baegseongdeuldo yeeonjadeul eul bulsinhayeoss-euni
hananim-i geudeul-ege yejeung-eul bonaess-euna geudeul-eun geue gwanhayeo bul sinhamyeo
geu san-e jib-eul sewi hananim-uibeol-eul pihago anjeonhage sallyeogo ha yeoss-euna
haneul-ui cheonbeol-i achim jigjeon-e geudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeoss-euni
geudeul-i eod-eossdeon modeun geos-i geudeul-ege yuyongchi moshayeossdeola
hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui modeun geos-eul jinlilo changjoha yeossgo ttohan simpan-ui nal-i olgeos-ila geuleomeulo geudaeneun geudeul-ege neogeu leobgo gwandaehala
sillo geudaeui junim-eun changjoju isa asineun bun-isila
hananim-eun geudaeege jaju nang songhaneun ilgobjeolgwa widaehan kkulan-eul jueossnola

hananim-i ilbu bulsinjadeullohayeo hyanglag-eul gajdolog han geos-e geudaeneunnun-eul keuge tteuji malmyeo geudeul-ui bul sin-eulo seulpeohaji malgo midneunjadeul-eul-wihae geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
illeogalodoe sillo naega bunmyeong han gyeong-gojaila
bubun-eulo bunlihan baegseongdeul-egegyesihaessdeus-i geudaeege kkulan-eul gyesihaess-eudoe
kkulan-eul bubun-eulo bunlihan bul sinjadeul-i iss-eoss-eumeulo
geudae junim-ui ileum-eulo hana nim-eun geudeul moduege jilmunhasinila
geudeul-i haenghadeon modeun geos-e gwanhan geos-ila
geuleomeulo geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos-eul seon-eonhadoe bulsinjadeullobuteo meollihala
hananim-eun jolonghaneun jadeullobuteo geudaeleul bohoham-e chungmanham-ila
hananimkke daleun sin-eul biyuha neun ja geudeul-eun god alge doelila
geudeul-i geojishaneun geos-eulo geu daeui ma-eum-i geunsimdoem-eul algo issna ni
geuleona geudaeui junim-eul chanmi hago eopdeulyeo buboghaneun ja jung-e iss-eula
geudaeui junim-eul gyeongbaehala hwag silhan geunal-i geudaeege olila
